attributes.additional_details: All travellers from Europe still use their pet passports to come into the UK.
attributes.background: Reintroduce pet passports and stop the profiteering of uk vets from travel into Europe for UK pets who issue animal health certificates for every trip into Europe.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action: 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701540
